columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event. See thein-portal schema referencefor details

columns.name: Application
columns.description: Application that performed the recorded action

columns.name: TargetAccountUpn
columns.description: User principal name (UPN) of the account that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: TargetAccountDisplayName
columns.description: Display name of the account that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: TargetDeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: DestinationDeviceName
columns.description: Name of the device running the server application that processed the recorded action

columns.name: DestinationIPAddress
columns.description: IP address of the device running the server application that processed the recorded action

columns.name: DestinationPort
columns.description: Destination port of the activity

columns.name: Protocol
columns.description: Protocol used during the communication

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: User name of the account

columns.name: AccountDomain
columns.description: Domain of the account

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: User principal name (UPN) of the account

columns.name: AccountSid
columns.description: Security Identifier (SID) of the account

columns.name: AccountObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID

columns.name: AccountDisplayName
columns.description: Name of the account user displayed in the address book. Typically a combination of a given or first name, a middle initial, and a last name or surname.

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP address assigned to the device during communication

columns.name: Port
columns.description: TCP port used during communication

columns.name: Location
columns.description: City, country/region, or other geographic location associated with the event

columns.name: ISP
columns.description: Internet service provider associated with the IP address

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the event

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information about the entity or event
